channel.title: Food!
channel.description: I need help on how to make a lava eel heal, as in food lol. If there is a tut or any one could help i would be so grateful. Source: 317 Delta

item.title: Food!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

It’s very straight forward, so I guess I’ll just give you the code. Be sure to read what I wrote in the code.

[code=java]
/**

  • Lava eel food code. Currently heals 15
  • Be sure to only change text and how much it heals if you want to modify
    /
    case 590: // lava eel code
    // you can eat this every 2 seconds
    if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000)
    return;
    c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
    c.setAnimation(0x33D); // emote
    c.frame174(317, 000, 020); // music (delete this line if the code gives errors)
    c.sM(“You eat the lava eel”); // text
    // when eaten and player has less hp then their max hp
    if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){
    c.sM(“It heals some health”); // text
    } // end above condition
    /    *
  • Do not change the script below unless you want to change amount of health
  • the lava eel gives
    */
    c.deleteItem(590, slot, 1); // delete item
    c.currentHealth += 15; // gain 15 hp
    if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints])
    c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints];
    c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + “”, 4016);
    break; // end case[/code]

Read full topic
